document_data.mainbody:
Dounalis Guff was the High Priest of Tempus at the Vault of Swords in Hillsfar. He also served as the chaplain for the citys military force, the Red Plumes.
A gruff and loud man in his mid-forties by 1374 DR, Dounalis believed that salvation from cowardice could only be found through death on the battlefield.
